Referrer Policy is set to 'origin-when-crossorigin'

Check that cross-origin subresources get the origin portion of the referrer URL and same-origin get the stripped referrer URL.

The referrer URL is origin when a document served over http requires an http sub-resource via a-tag using the meta-referrer delivery method and when the target request is cross-origin.

See specification details for this test.

Scenario outline

Delivery method meta-referrer
Origin transition cross-origin
Protocol transition from http to http
Subresource type a-tag
Expected result Referrer URL should be origin
